DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of annular sizing strategy (MDCT versus TEE) in transcatheter aortic valve implantation on the prevalence and severity of paravalvular regurgitation.
DOC.brief_title: Transcatheter Heart Valve (THV) Sizing and Leakage After Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation (TAVI) Before and After Establishing Routine Preprocedure Multi Slice Computerized Tomography (MSCT) Aortic Assessment. A Retrospective Registry Study
DOC.criteria: Patients implanted with a THV at Aarhus University Hospital Learning curve patients (the first 40 patients implanted with a THV device at Aarhus University Hospital, Skejby).
